mapper.select: select rno,reviewIdx,storeIdx,memberId,reviewContent,reviewScore from (select rownum rno,reviewIdx,storeIdx,memberId,reviewContent,reviewScore from (select reviewIdx,storeIdx,memberId,reviewContent,reviewScore from review order by reviewIdx desc )) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update review set reviewContent = #{reviewContent} where reviewIdx=#{reviewIdx}
